snippet.title: Unscripted AI NPCs in Detective RPG - Inworld Origins Trailer
snippet.description:
Inspired by the anime Metropolis, Origins takes place in a society where humans and robots coexist under a shaky social system that separates the haves and have nots. After an explosion in Metropolis, you’ve arrived on the scene as the lead detective. Question witnesses, uncover the mystery, crack the case.

Origins is a technical demo created by the team at Inworld to showcase NPCs powered by artificial intelligence. Characters generate responses in real-time based on player inputs and the dialogue is completely unscripted. Origins was built using Unreal Engine and MetaHuman Creator. 

Apply for keys: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf4cgcaqWyPFpSZ6ohqmtfCH7V-gb4jIi7VR5yvgpJFV9BzTQ/viewform

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2199920/Origins/

Create smarter MetaHumans with Inworld's SDK for Unreal Engine: https://docs.inworld.ai/docs/tutorial-integrations/unreal-engine/?utm_campaign=Origins&utm_medium=Social&utm_source=YouTube

Origins was first previewed with TechCrunch in 2022: https://techcrunch.com/2022/04/28/inworld-shows-off-impressive-ai-powered-character-generation-and-interaction/

🕹 Learn about AI-powered gameplay: https://bit.ly/49mSJ3V
🛠 Build with dev docs: https://bit.ly/3VFNeKF
🎮 Join our Discord - talk AI and gaming: https://discord.gg/kErfdg5Bkg

#gaming #chatgpt #unrealengine #chatbot #gamedev #rpg
